title: Giving zakah to my housband to give it to someone
transcript: and she says that when I have a zakat money and I give it to my husband and I tell him to give it to someone who is in need is this permissible the answer is yes providing that you are sure that your husband would not give it to someone who does not qualify for zaka if your husband gives it to his brother and who is well off this is unacceptable and your zakat is not been paid if you show that your husband will take it only to those who are poor and needy the answer is okay and permissible
